1.content: Create individual restaurant detail pages at /restaurants/[id]
1.details: Dynamic pages with galleries, reviews, booking calendar, menu preview, map integration, and social sharing

2.details: Categorized items, search/filter, dietary info, favorites, allergen warnings, special offers

3.details: Interactive calendar, time slots, table preferences, special occasions, large party handling, multi-step process, payment/deposit, multi-channel confirmation

4.content: Create booking management dashboard for users at /bookings
4.details: ✅ Upcoming bookings section with reservation cards ✅ Modify/cancel with 24-hour policy enforcement ✅ Booking history with past reservations ✅ Re-book functionality for quick rebooking ✅ Review reminder system for unreviewed visits ✅ Loyalty points tracker with membership tier ✅ Push notification preferences toggle ✅ Cancellation policy with refund information ✅ Mock data for demonstration

5.details: ✅ Dashboard overview with key metrics and quick stats ✅ Booking management with approval/decline workflow ✅ Menu management with item editing and availability ✅ Customer reviews management with response system ✅ Analytics and insights with revenue trends ✅ Special offers management with creation/editing ✅ Restaurant profile editing with contact info ✅ Comprehensive mock data for demonstration ✅ Sidebar navigation between sections

6.details: Wait list functionality, pre-order capabilities, QR check-in, split bill calculator, group ordering, loyalty program integration, social features
